name: Police Helicopter On Duty 3D
description:
This police helicopter is ready to be on duty today! Complete a training mission and you are ready to hunt for poachers, rescue wild animals and people. Just be careful, do not collide with the ground and mountains. You have all you need - guns and rockets, easy to use controls and great graphics!

Key features:
- five different locations: from safari to snow themes
- great 3d graphics
- realistic police helicopter
- easy to use controls
- and much more!
